H0.text: Frontal is the lobe of the brain where the primary motor cortex is located.

H1.text: Parietal is the lobe of the brain that contains the primary motor cortex.

H2.text: Temporal lobe is the location of the primary motor cortex in the brain.

H3.text: Occipital is the lobe of the brain where the primary motor cortex is located.

A4.text: The primary motor cortex is located in the dorsal portion of the frontal lobe.

A5.text: The primary motor cortex is bordered by the primary somatosensory cortex, which lies on the posterior wall of the central sulcus.
